html.div:
Holistic View of User Activities.
The Diagram provides a holistic view of the activities performed by a User. i.e. PCs where he has logged in, emails sent, Removable Drives connected, Malicious Sites accessed and Files accessed.
Select the Asset and Time Period for which the activities needs to be monitored.
